resolveRemoteArtifact

public static InputStream resolveRemoteArtifact(org.apache.maven.artifact.Artifact a)
                                         throws VictimsException
Attempts to resolve a remote Maven artifact and return an stream to its content.

Parameters:
a - Artifact to resolve.
Returns:
An input stream to that artifact.
Throws:
VictimsException

resolveLocalArtifact

public static InputStream resolveLocalArtifact(org.apache.maven.artifact.Artifact a)
                                        throws VictimsException
Attempts to resolve the specified artifact in order to fingerprint it. In most use cases any dependency that is required by Maven will exist in a users .m2 local repository. If it doesn't by default Maven will pull those files down from the Central Repository.

Parameters:
a - The artifact to resolve.
Returns:
InputStream that for the artifact file content.
Throws:
VictimsException

locate

public static InputStream locate(org.apache.maven.artifact.Artifact a)
                          throws VictimsException
Try to resolve the specified artifact locally, and if that fails look up the remote instance.

Parameters:
a - Artifact to search for.
Returns:
A stream to the artifacts content
Throws:
VictimsException
